resources.string: A NP-Hard problem\nBeat the DFS based approach

This game starts from the top left corner as starting flood. You gotta make this flood of one color (the whole board) by adding (tapping on) the appropriate neighbour color.

 The interesting part is that you have to do this in minimum number of steps.

 You are competing with GreedyDFS approach of this NP-Hard problem.

 Cheers!!!
Awesome!!\nYou know exact DFS strategy.\nFAAD EKDUM
Cool!!\nYou know how to use Bonus points.\n
You are running out of Moves.\nYou really only fail when you stop trying.\nWould you like to take revenge with a new game or you wanna continue ?
